languages.text: Абеляр Версериан продолжал службу в качестве сенешаля. Безумие, пропитавшее корабль Вольного Торговца, поразило и его разум. Голос возлюбленной супруги Катарины, по которому он так скучал, начал преследовать его повсюду. Сначала радостно приветствуя охватившее его сумасшествие, а потом в ужасе убегая от него, почтенный сенешаль пытался заглушить голос жены звуками приказов и воплей казнимых за небрежность членов экипажа. Вид этого сурового начальника, всклокоченного, в грязной форме, с силовым тесаком наголо в одной руке и звенящей корабельной рындой в другой, вселял ужас в сердца его подчиненных.

Abelard Werserian continued to serve as Seneschal. The madness permeating the Rogue Trader's ship had struck his mind as well. The voice of his beloved and dearly missed spouse Quatharina began haunting his every step. At first, the esteemed Seneschal welcomed the insanity that overcame him, then he ran from it in terror, trying to drown out his wife's voice in the barking of orders and the screams of castigated crew members. The sight of the grave officer, ragged, in a dirty uniform, with a power cleaver in one hand and ringing ship's bell in the other, filled his subordinates with dread.
languages.original_text: Абеляр Версериан продолжал службу в качестве сенешаля. Безумие, пропитавшее корабль Вольного Торговца, поразило и его разум. Голос возлюбленной супруги Катарины, по которому он так скучал, начал преследовать его повсюду. Сначала радостно приветствуя охватившее его сумасшествие, а потом в ужасе убегая от него, почтенный сенешаль пытался заглушить голос жены звуками приказов и воплей казнимых за небрежность членов экипажа. Вид этого сурового начальника, всклокоченного, в грязной форме, с силовым тесаком наголо в одной руке и звенящей корабельной рындой в другой, вселял ужас в сердца его подчиненных.

traits.locale_text: Abelard Werserian continued his service as a Seneschal. The madness, permeating the Rogue Trader's ship, struck his mind as well. The voice of his beloved spouse Quatharina he missed oh so much, started haunting him everywhere. At first, the honourable Seneschal welcomed this insanity, that overtook him. Then he ran from it in terror, trying to drown the voice of his wife with the sound of orders and screams of crewmembers punished for being negligent in performing their duties. The sight of the stern headman, scraggly, wearing dirty uniforms, with a power cleaver in one hand and ringing bell in the other, instilled terror in the hearts of his subordinates.

Abelard Werserian continued his service as a Seneschal. The madness, permeating the Rogue Trader's ship, struck his mind as well. The voice of his beloved spouse Quatharina he missed oh so much, started haunting him everywhere. At first, the honourable Seneschal welcomed this insanity, that overtook him. Then he ran from it in terror, trying to drown the voice of his wife with the sound of orders and screams of crewmembers punished for being negligent in performing their duties. The sight of the stern headman, scraggly, wearing dirty uniforms, with a power cleaver in one hand and ringing bell in the other, instilled terror in the hearts of his subordinates.

The voice of his beloved and dearly missed spouse Quatharina began haunting his every step. At first, the honourable Seneschal welcomed the insanity that overcame him. Then he ran from it in terror, trying to drown out his wife's voice in the barking of orders and the screams of disciplined crewmembers. The sight of the grave officer, ragged, in a dirty uniform, with a power cleaver in one hand and ringing bell in the other, filled his subordinates with dread.

Abelard Werserian continued his service as a Seneschal. The madness permeating the Rogue Trader's ship had struck his mind as well. At first, the esteemed Seneschal welcomed the insanity that overcame him, then he ran from it in terror, trying to drown out his wife's voice in the barking of orders and the screams of castigated crew members. The sight of the grave officer, ragged, in a dirty uniform, with a power cleaver in one hand and ringing ship's bell in the other, filled his subordinates with dread.

languages.text: 阿贝拉德·韦尔森继续履行总领的职责，而与此同时，行商浪人船上弥漫的疯狂烙入了他的思想之中。无论他做什么，他挚爱的妻子奎莎莉娜的声音都会在他身后响起。一开始，受人尊敬的总领以热情的态度欢迎头脑中的疯狂，但在那之后，他却惊恐地闪躲着，试图以命令与呵斥盖过他妻子的声音。如今，这位严肃的军官如今已老态龙钟。他总是穿着肮脏不堪的制服，一只手握着能量刀，而另一只手提着摇铃。他的样子让他的下属惶恐不已。
languages.original_text: Abelard Werserian continued to serve as Seneschal. The madness permeating the Rogue Trader's ship had struck his mind as well. The voice of his beloved and dearly missed spouse Quatharina began haunting his every step. At first, the esteemed Seneschal welcomed the insanity that overcame him, then he ran from it in terror, trying to drown out his wife's voice in the barking of orders and the screams of castigated crew members. The sight of the grave officer, ragged, in a dirty uniform, with a power cleaver in one hand and ringing ship's bell in the other, filled his subordinates with dread.

traits.locale_text: 阿贝拉德·韦尔森继续履行总领的职责，而与此同时，行商浪人船上弥漫的疯狂烙入了他的思想之中。无论他做什么，他挚爱的妻子奎莎莉娜的声音都会在他身后响起。一开始，可敬的总领以热情的态度欢迎头脑中的疯狂，但在那之后，他却惊恐地闪躲着，试图以命令与呵斥盖过他妻子的声音。如今，这位严肃的军官如今已老态龙钟。他总是穿着肮脏不堪的制服，一只手握着能量刀，而另一只手提着摇铃。他的样子让他的下属惶恐不已。

languages.text: Abelard Werserian diente weiterhin als Truchsess. Der Wahnsinn, der das Schiff {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} ergriffen hatte, hatte auch ihn befallen. Die Stimme seiner geliebten Gemahlin Quatharina, die er so schrecklich vermisste, suchte ihn unaufhörlich heim. Zunächst begrüßte der ehrenwerte Truchsess den Wahnsinn, der ihn übermannte. Dann rannte er panisch vor ihm davon, versuchte die Stimme seiner Frau durch laut gebellte Befehle und die Schreie gezüchtigter Crewmitglieder zu übertönen. Der Anblick des düsteren Offiziers, ungepflegt, in einer dreckigen Uniform, mit einem Energiebeil in der einen und einer klingenden Schiffsglocke in der anderen Hand, erfüllte seine Untergebenen mit Furcht.
languages.original_text: Abelard Werserian continued to serve as Seneschal. The madness permeating the Rogue Trader's ship had struck his mind as well. The voice of his beloved and dearly missed spouse Quatharina began haunting his every step. At first, the esteemed Seneschal welcomed the insanity that overcame him, then he ran from it in terror, trying to drown out his wife's voice in the barking of orders and the screams of castigated crew members. The sight of the grave officer, ragged, in a dirty uniform, with a power cleaver in one hand and ringing ship's bell in the other, filled his subordinates with dread.

traits.locale_text: Abelard Werserian setzte seinen Dienst als Truchsess fort. Der Wahnsinn, der das Schiff {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} ergriffen hatte, hatte auch ihn befallen. Die Stimme seiner geliebten Gemahlin Quatharina, die er so schrecklich vermisste, suchte ihn unaufhörlich heim. Zunächst begrüßte der ehrenwerte Truchsess den Wahnsinn, der ihn übermannte. Dann rannte er panisch vor ihm davon, versuchte die Stimme seiner Frau durch laut gebellte Befehle und die Schreie bestrafter Crewmitglieder zu übertönen. Der Anblick des düsteren Offiziers, ungepflegt, in einer dreckigen Uniform, mit einem Energiebeil in der einen und einer klingenden Glocke in der anderen Hand, erfüllte seine Untergebenen mit Furcht.

languages.text: Abélard Werserian continua d'assumer son rôle de sénéchal, mais la démence qui s'était répandue à bord du vaisseau {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande} avait aussi gagné son esprit. La voix de Quatharina, sa tendre épouse disparue, commença à le hanter en toute circonstance. Dans un premier temps, l'honorable sénéchal ouvrit grand les bras à la folie qui le submergeait, avant d'être gagné par une peur insondable. Il tenta alors d'étouffer la voix de sa femme en aboyant des ordres à tout propos ou en se délectant des hurlements des membres d'équipage punis, au point que la simple vue de cet officier vêtu de son uniforme en lambeaux, tenant un hachoir énergétique dans une main et sonnant la cloche du vaisseau de l'autre suffisait à emplir ses subordonnés de terreur.
languages.original_text: Abelard Werserian continued to serve as Seneschal. The madness permeating the Rogue Trader's ship had struck his mind as well. The voice of his beloved and dearly missed spouse Quatharina began haunting his every step. At first, the esteemed Seneschal welcomed the insanity that overcame him, then he ran from it in terror, trying to drown out his wife's voice in the barking of orders and the screams of castigated crew members. The sight of the grave officer, ragged, in a dirty uniform, with a power cleaver in one hand and ringing ship's bell in the other, filled his subordinates with dread.

traits.locale_text: Abélard Werserian continua d'assumer son rôle de sénéchal, mais la démence qui s'était répandue à bord du vaisseau {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande} avait aussi gagné son esprit. La voix de Quatharina, sa tendre épouse disparue, commença à le hanter en toute circonstance. Dans un premier temps, l'honorable sénéchal ouvrit grand les bras à la folie qui montait en lui, avant d'être gagné par une peur insondable. Il tenta alors d'étouffer la voix de sa femme en aboyant des ordres à tout propos ou en se délectant des hurlements des membres d'équipage punis à la moindre incartade, au point que la simple vue de cet officier vêtu de son uniforme en lambeaux et tenant un hachoir énergétique dans une main et une cloche dans l'autre suffisait à emplir ses subordonnés de terreur.

languages.text: Abelard Werserian continuó sus funciones de Senescal. La locura que se cubría la nave de{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente acabó por extenderse también a su mente. La voz de su querida y muy añorada esposa Quatharina empezó a seguirle con cada paso. Al principio, el estimado Senescal aceptó la demencia que le acosaba, pero más tarde empezó a huir de ella aterrado, tratando de ahogar la voz de su mujer con el ladrido de las órdenes y los gritos de los tripulantes disciplinados. La imagen del solemne oficial, agotado, con un uniforme sucio y portando una cuchilla de energía en una mano y una campana de a bordo en la otra, aterraba a sus subordinados.
languages.original_text: Abelard Werserian continued to serve as Seneschal. The madness permeating the Rogue Trader's ship had struck his mind as well. The voice of his beloved and dearly missed spouse Quatharina began haunting his every step. At first, the esteemed Seneschal welcomed the insanity that overcame him, then he ran from it in terror, trying to drown out his wife's voice in the barking of orders and the screams of castigated crew members. The sight of the grave officer, ragged, in a dirty uniform, with a power cleaver in one hand and ringing ship's bell in the other, filled his subordinates with dread.

traits.locale_text: Abelard Werserian continuó sus funciones de Senescal. La locura que se cubría la nave de{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente acabó por extenderse también a su mente. La voz de su querida y muy añorada esposa Quatharina empezó a seguirle con cada paso. Al principio, el honorable Senescal aceptó la demencia que le acosaba, pero más tarde empezó a huir de ella aterrado, tratando de ahogar la voz de su mujer con el ladrido de las órdenes y los gritos de los tripulantes disciplinados. La imagen del solemne oficial, agotado, con un uniforme sucio y portando una cuchilla de energía en una mano y una campanita en la otra, aterraba a sus subordinados.

languages.text: アベラルド・ウェルザリアンは家令長としての務めを果たし続けた。自由開拓者の船に染み渡る狂気は、彼の心にもまた強く作用していた。今は亡き最愛の妻クアサリナの声が、彼の行く手にどこまでも付きまとうようになった。はじめ、高潔な家令長は自らを冒す狂気を歓迎した。やがて恐怖に逃げまどうようになり、命令をいくつもわめきたてながら、非難する乗員たちの喚声を聞くことによって妻の声をかき消そうとした。かの厳粛な武官が汚れた制服をまとい、一方の手には幅広の刃を携え、もう一方の手で船の鐘を振りかざすその姿に、部下はことごとく恐れをなしたという。
languages.original_text: Abelard Werserian continued to serve as Seneschal. The madness permeating the Rogue Trader's ship had struck his mind as well. The voice of his beloved and dearly missed spouse Quatharina began haunting his every step. At first, the esteemed Seneschal welcomed the insanity that overcame him, then he ran from it in terror, trying to drown out his wife's voice in the barking of orders and the screams of castigated crew members. The sight of the grave officer, ragged, in a dirty uniform, with a power cleaver in one hand and ringing ship's bell in the other, filled his subordinates with dread.

traits.locale_text: アベラルド・ウェルザリアンは家令長としての務めを果たし続けた。ローグトレーダーの船に染み渡る狂気は、彼の心にもまた強く作用していた。今は亡き最愛の妻クアサリナの声が、彼の行く手にどこまでも付きまとうようになった。はじめ、高潔な家令長は自らを冒す狂気を歓迎した。やがて恐怖に逃げまどうようになり、命令をいくつもわめきたてながら、規律正しき乗員たちの喚声を聞くことによって妻の声をかき消そうとした。かの厳粛な武官が汚れた制服をまとい、一方の手には幅広の刃を携え、もう一方の手で鐘を振りかざすその姿に、部下はことごとく恐れをなしたという。

languages.text: Abelard Werserian, Seneşallik görevini sürdürdü. Hür Tacir'in gemisine yayılan delilik, onun zihnine de tesir etti. Çok sevdiği ve çok özlediği eşi Quatharina'nın hayali, her adımında ona eşlik etmeye başladı. Saygıdeğer Seneşal, ilk başta kendisini ele geçiren bu deliliği iyi karşılasa da bir süre sonra korkuyla ondan kaçmaya, eşinin sesini emirler yağdırarak ve dövülen tayfaların çığlıklarını dinleyerek bastırmaya başladı. Bir elinde güç satırı, diğer elinde geminin çanıyla gezen; bakımsız, kirli üniformalı, katı subayın görüntüsü bile emrindekileri dehşete düşürmeye yetiyordu.
languages.original_text: Abelard Werserian continued to serve as Seneschal. The madness permeating the Rogue Trader's ship had struck his mind as well. The voice of his beloved and dearly missed spouse Quatharina began haunting his every step. At first, the esteemed Seneschal welcomed the insanity that overcame him, then he ran from it in terror, trying to drown out his wife's voice in the barking of orders and the screams of castigated crew members. The sight of the grave officer, ragged, in a dirty uniform, with a power cleaver in one hand and ringing ship's bell in the other, filled his subordinates with dread.

traits.locale_text: Abelard Werserian, Seneşal olarak görev yapmayı sürdürdü. Hür Tacir'in gemisinde yayılan delilik, onun zihnine de tesir etmişti. Çok sevdiği ve çok özlediği eşi Quatharina'nın hayali her adımında ona eşlik etmeye başladı. Saygıdeğer Seneşal ilk başta kendisini ele geçiren bu deliliği iyi karşıladı ancak bir süre sonra korkuyla ondan kaçmaya, eşinin sesini çevresine emirler yağdırarak ve dövülen tayfaların çığlıklarını dinleyerek bastırmaya başladı. Bir elinde güç satırı, diğer elinde geminin çanıyla gezen, bakımsız, kirli üniformalı, katı subayın görüntüsü bile emrindekilerin içini dehşetle doldurmaya yetiyordu.
